Gemstone Dragonborn

Draconic Ancestry. You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. This determines the damage type and area shape of your other traits.

Draconic Ancestry
DragonDamage Type
AmethystForce
EmeraldPsychic
RubyRadiant
SapphireThunder
TopazNecrotic

Draconic Resistance. You have resistance to the damage type associated with your Draconic Ancestry.

Breath Weapon. When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of energy in a 15-foot cone. Your Draconic Ancestry determines the damage type. Each creature in the area of effect must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d10 damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful save. The damage increases to 2d10 at 5th level, 3d10 at 11th level, and 4d10 at 17th level. After you use your breath weapon, you can’t use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

Breath Weapon DC = 8 + Proficiency Bonus + Constitution Modifier
